sections.purpose: To administer precise volumes of liquid formulations directly into the stomach of animals.
sections.scope: Applicable to oral dosing in pharmacology studies.
procedure: Select appropriate gavage needle size based on species and body weight.
Attach the needle securely to the dosing syringe.
Measure and load the required dose volume.
Restrain the animal and gently introduce the gavage needle along the esophagus.
Deliver the dose slowly while monitoring for signs of distress.
Withdraw the needle carefully and observe the animal post dosing.
Clean and sterilize reusable gavage needles after use.
precautions: Avoid forceful insertion to prevent esophageal or gastric perforation.
Use appropriate restraint methods to minimize risk.
Do not dose animals that show respiratory distress or severe illness.
Inspect needles regularly for bends or rough edges.
Train staff thoroughly in gavage technique before independent use.
